body_text: What will happen to the tailed beast if the jinchuruki is killed? It is shown in the anime that the jinchuruki is caught and the tailed beast is extracted and sealed into the Demonic statue by the Akatsuki. What will happen if the jinchuruki is killed somewhere else? In search for Tsunade arc, during the fight between Jiraiya-Tsunade and Orochimaru, Orochimaru tries to kill Naruto as he is the jinchuruki of the nine tails. What would have happened to the nine tails if he had killed Naruto?
What happens to a tailed beast if it's Jinkiurichi is killed? What happens to a tailed beast if it's Jinkiurichi is killed while he still has the tailed beast inside of him/her?
